alert.note: Alert for Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 16 at 2:12PM AKST until February 18 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THURSDAY TO 6 AM AKST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Plan on difficult travel conditions. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph will cause areas of blowing and drifting snow reducing the visibility to one half mile or less at times. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch are expected. * WHERE...Steese and Dalton Highway Summits. * WHEN...6 AM Thursday to 6 AM Friday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Look for reduced visibilities at times. Cold wind chills as low as 50 below zero will cause frostbite in as little as 10 minutes to exposed skin. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause travel difficulties. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
